tool_description: Easily check if a certain e-mail address is valid. Is it a valid domain? Is the e-mail a temporary/disposable e-mail? That’s a common indicator of spamming/trolling, so now there’s an API for you so you can easily block it!
name: E-mail Check Invalid or Disposable Domain
title: E-mail Check Invalid or Disposable Domain
tool_name: E-mail Check Invalid or Disposable Domain

api_list.name: checkDisposableEmail
api_list.description: REST API to lookup disposable email

api_list.name: newlyRegisteredDomains
api_list.description: REST API to lookup newly registered domains

optional_parameters.name: date
optional_parameters.description: registered date of domain to be searched

optional_parameters.name: keywords
optional_parameters.description: contains keywords of domain to be searched

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: page of domain to be searched

optional_parameters.name: exclude
optional_parameters.description: exclude keywords of domain to be searched

api_list.name: whois
api_list.description: REST API to WhoIS lookup data

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: domain name of WhoIS to be searched

api_list.name: emailValidation
api_list.description: Clean your email list database with our free email checker and verifier
